description: This Flutter widget defines an Accounts screen with functionality to list accounts, refresh data, add new accounts via a modal form, and manage account state using Provider.

classes.name: AccountsScreen
classes.description: Main screen widget displaying list of accounts, with options to add and refresh

classes.name: _AccountsScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the UI logic for AccountsScreen, including fetching data and opening the add form

classes.name: _AccountForm
classes.description: A form widget to create a new account, displayed in a modal bottom sheet

classes.name: _AccountFormState
classes.description: State class managing the form controls and submission logic for creating a new account

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the AccountsScreen state and fetches account data after the first frame

methods.name: _openAddForm
methods.description: Opens a modal to add a new account

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the main widget tree for the AccountsScreen, including list, refresh, and loading states

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Handles form submission to create a new account using the provider
